mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT perms FROM sys_user_role LEFT JOIN sys_role ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role_menu.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu ON sys_menu.id = sys_role_menu.menu_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND sys_role.status = 0 AND sys_menu.status = 1;

SELECT CONCAT('ROLE_', role_key) AS role FROM sys_user, sys_user_role, sys_role WHERE sys_user.`id` = sys_user_role.`user_id` AND sys_user_role.`role_id` = sys_role.`id` AND sys_user.`id` = #{userId};
